title: National Geographic Magazine Vol. 10 - 03. March 1899
description:
The National Geographic Magazine, an illustrated monthly, Vol X, March 1899.
It includes the following articles:

  • The Original Territory of the United States, by Hon. David J. Hill
  • Porto Rico, by Prof. Robert T. Hill

sections.title: The Original Territory of the United States, The struggle for the continent
The Original Territory of the United States, The territorial claims and cessions of the States
The Original Territory of the United States, The negotiations with Great Britain
The Original Territory of the United States, The influence of the national domain
Porto Rico, Configuration and Geology, Part 1
Porto Rico, Configuration and Geology, Part 2
Porto Rico, Configuration and Geology, Part 3
